attributes.action: Post Nominal Letters or Titles for armed service personnel who have served in conflict tours of duty.
attributes.additional_details:
Petition to request a discussion in the houses of parliament regarding post-nominal letters or a title for Armed Forces personnel who have served in a conflict tours of duty.

An example would be personnel who have served on OP Telic and OP Herrick who have qualified for a clasp.

Unfortunally Medals are forgotten about and placed into a draw or up the loft. Giving qualifying service personnel a title or post nominal letters will show recognition for the service and dedication given to their Queen and Country.
